The Accuro ultrasound from RIVANNA is AdvaMed's #DeviceOfTheWeek. It is designed to ensure pregnant patients with scoliosis, prior back injuries or surgery, or obesity can safely receive an epidural to ease labor pain. The portable device combines AI overlays of anatomical structures with real-time identification of spinal landmarks to guide precise anesthesia placement. Accuro can significantly improve patient outcomes, alleviate anxieties, and enhance the confidence of health care professionals. Take a look at this case in which Accuro bridged the complexities of severe scoliosis to ensure successful epidural placement. https://lnkd.in/epviN6gv
